<!-- setup the environment -->
```{r r-environment-setup}
#| cache: false
#| echo: false
#| include: false

list(root.dir=Sys.getenv(x='ANALYSIS_PATH', unset=getwd())) |>
	do.call(what=knitr::opts_knit$set)

list(cache=FALSE,
     message=FALSE,
     warnings=FALSE,
     crop=TRUE) |>
	do.call(what=knitr::opts_chunk$set)

knitr::knit_hooks$set(crop=knitr::hook_pdfcrop)

rmarkdown::metadata |>
	purrr::pluck('report', 'resources', 'ncpus', .default=1) |>
	doMC::registerDoMC()
```
